data.title: 2024 Salak Tinggi Park and Ride: Latest Parking Rates and Guide
data.meta_description: Latest 2024 daily and overnight parking rates, guides, and FAQ for Salak Tinggi Park and Ride Multi-storey Car Park and Open Car Parks.
data.meta_site_name: Kuala Lumpur Insider | Kuala Lumpur Insider is the number one site for all things about this great city
data.text:
If you’re planning to travel from Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA) or KLIA2, Salak Tinggi Park and Ride is a convenient option for those who want to park their car safely and at an affordable rate. The parking facility is located near the Salak Tinggi ERL station, which is one of the stations for the KLIA Transit Train services.

Table of Content

Salak Tinggi Park and Ride Parking Options

There are 4 parking options available:

Covered Multi-storey Car Park (820 bays) | Waze here

Open Car Park A (230 bays) – Season parking only | Waze here

Open Car Park B (220 bays) | Waze here

Open Car Park C (650 bays) | Waze here

Salak Tinggi Park and Ride Parking Rates

Covered Multi-storey Car Park (820 bays)

Open Car Park A – Season Parking only (230 bays)

Open Car Park B (220 bays)

Open Car Park C (650 bays)

Payment Method

Salak Tinggi Park and Ride accepts a range of payment options to make it easy for you to pay for your parking. You can pay with:

Cash

Debit/Credit Card

Touch ‘n Go

Please ensure you don’t use the same card to access car parks elsewhere before exiting the first one, otherwise you will not be able to exit the first car park by doing so

Operating Hours

The parking areas are open 24 hours daily.

Reservation and Bookings

Booking or reserving parking is not available at Salak Tinggi Park and Ride. Parkings are on a first come first serve basis.

FAQs

1. Safety & Security

CCTV cameras are in place at the Multi-storey Car Park building and Open Car Park A. On-ground personnel are on duty 24/7 at each car park.

2. If I enter Car Park C at 2:00pm today (Day 1) and exit at 10:00am on Day 4, how much will my parking be?

Daytime rate on Day 1 = RM3

Overnight rate on Day 1 = RM7

Day 2 = RM10

Day 3 = RM10

Day 4 = RM10

Total = RM40

3. Is Salak Tinggi parking always full?

The parking is available on a first come first serve basis so there is no guarantee that it is full or not. If Car Park A is full, there are still Car Parks B and C available
